children.question: So the problem is cornering. Can you add more details?
So you are understeering. Does this happen on slow or fast corners?
Okay, in slow corners right, What about stability, can we sacrifice it for more grip in slow corners?
Okay, so can't go at fast speed through corner, we can easy fix it but you will be slower on straights, are you ok with this?
solutions: Add more negative camber to your front tyres

children.question: Well maybe you can specify: Do you understeer while enterning or exiting corner?
So you are Oversteering. Does this happen on fast or slow corners?
Ok, so the problem is on slower corners. Are you willing to lower ride height or this can cause a problem?
Ok, fast corners cause oversteer. Can we lose some top speed to fix that?
solutions: Add more negative camber on the rear

children.question: So your car struggle onn straights. Can you add more details?
Not reaching top speed? Tell me about your grip in corners?
So we can lose some traction to get speed, you prefer more under or oversteer
We can lower your ride height, Does your car hits road during braking?
solutions: lower ride height in front and rear

children.question: To maintain current level of grip and gain top speed we can modify gearing, are you willing to lose some acceleration to gain speed?
solutions: You can lower final gear ratio, and on least gears, avoid lowering on 1st and 2nd

children.question: Your car isn't stable, What about other situations? Is it stable during braking, acceleration or cornering?
Problem with braking? You prefer more over or understeer?
solutions: Turn brake bias more on the front

children.question: Problem with acceleration? What about your top speed can we sacrifice it?
solutions: You can raise gear ratios on 1st, 2nd and 3rd gears

children.question: You need also top speed, okay, Does your car have turbo?
So you got problems on different surface or in rain. Can you add more details?
So you are racing on track but car can't handle bumps and curbs, what about cornering, does it also struggle?
Dampers
Antiroll bar
Springs
So you are racing on bad surface, is it problem with rain or you are in the offroad car?
To increase grip in rain we can change compound, but the car will be slower when track drys is it ok?
solutions: Change tyre compound for wet or intermediate

children.question: Offroad corners right?, You prefer to take corners smoothly or aggressively?
solutions: Stiffer the differencial and Anti-roll bars

children.question: Drifting
Camber
Toe
Differencial
Antiroll bar
You can't get the feel of brakes. Can you add more detail?
Seems you are locking your tyres, Do you lose your rear during braking or just lock front tyres and can't turn
solutions: Transfer brake bias to front tyres
Transfer brake bias to the rear

children.question: Brake bias is good but still something not working? Maybe we can lower brake pressure, or you still need fast braking?
